qas.question: What are the names of newspapers read widely in English?

context: Though situated in a remote part of the country, <a0_0><b5_0>Himachal Pradesh<b5_0/><a0_0/> has an active community of journalists and publishers. Several newspapers and magazines are <a1_0><b6_0>published in more than one language, and their reach extends to almost all the Hindi-speaking states<b6_0/><a1_0/>. <a4_0><b8_0>Radio and TV<b8_0/><a4_0/> have permeated significantly. Judging by the number of people writing to these media, there is a very large media-aware population in the state. <a2_0><b7_0>All major English daily newspapers<b7_0/><a2_0/> are available in Shimla and district headquarters. <a3_0><b9_0>Aapka Faisla, Amar Ujala, Panjab Kesari, Divya Himachal<b9_0/><a3_0/> are Hindi daily newspaper with local editions are read widely.
